name: Yuji Boku
description: "Yuji" is a series of fonts digitizing handwriting by the calligrapher Yuji Kataoka. Yuji Boku is a new and joyful design. It has both simplicity and warmth. Fonts in the Yuji Family: Yuji Mai Yuji Syuku To contribute to the project, visit github.com/Kinutafontfactory/Yuji
author: Kinuta Font Factory
